Object.create(x)

let a = {
    name: 'å°é»‘å­'
}
let b = Object.create(a)
console.log(b.name) // å°é»‘å­ï¼Œ ä¼šéšå¼ç»§æ‰¿åŸå¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§

Object.assign({}, x, ...)

let a = {
    name: 'å°é»‘å­',
    hobby: {
        n: 'running'
    }
}

a.hobby.n = 'coding'
console.log(b.hobby.n) // coding

concat

let arr = [1, 2, 3, {a: 10}]
let newArr = [].concat(arr)
arr[3].a = 1
console.log(newArr) // [ 1, 2, 3, { a: 1 } ]

slice

let arr = [1, 2, 3, {a: 10}]
let newArr = arr.slice(0)
// åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°0ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æå–æ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„
arr[3].a = 1
console.log(newArr) // [ 1, 2, 3, { a: 1 } ]

æ•°ç»„è§£æ„

let arr = [1, 2, 3, {a: 10}]
let newArr = [...arr]
arr[3].a = 1
console.log(newArr) // [ 1, 2, 3, { a: 1 } ]

JSON.stringify

æ‹·è´çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„å€¼ä¸­å¦‚æœæœ‰å‡½æ•°ã€undefinedã€symbol è¿™å‡ ç§ç±»å‹ï¼Œç»è¿‡JSON.stringifyåºåˆ—åŒ–ä¹‹åçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­è¿™ä¸ªé”®å€¼å¯¹ä¼šæ¶ˆå¤±ï¼›æ‹·è´Dateå¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹ä¼šå˜æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼›æ— æ³•æ‹·è´ä¸å¯æšä¸¾çš„å±æ€§ï¼›æ— æ³•æ‹·è´å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹é“¾ï¼›æ‹·è´RegExpå¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹ä¼šå˜æˆç©ºå¯¹è±¡ï¼›å¯¹è±¡ä¸­å«æœ‰NaNã€Infinityä»¥åŠ-Infinityï¼ŒJSON åºåˆ—åŒ–çš„ç»“æœä¼šå˜æˆnullï¼›æ— æ³•æ‹·è´å¯¹è±¡çš„å¾ªç¯åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå³å¯¹è±¡æˆç¯ (obj[key] = obj).

    name: 'å°é»‘å­',

    hobby: {
        type: 'coding'

å‡½æ•°åº“lodashçš„_.cloneDeepæ–¹æ³•

const _ = require('lodash')
const obj1 = {
    a: 1,
    b: { f: { g: 1 } },
    c: [1, 2, 3]
}
const obj2 = _.cloneDeep(obj1)
console.log(obj1.b.f === obj2.b.f) // false

æµ…æ‹·è´å®ç°

function shalldowClone(target){
    // åªæ‹·è´å¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹
    if(!target || typeof target !== 'object') return target
    let targetCopy = Array.isArray(target) ? [] : {}
    for(let key in target){
        // ä¸è¦éšå¼,hasOwnPropertyè¿”å›trueåˆ™ä»£è¡¨å±æ€§åœ¨å®ä¾‹ä¸Š
        if(target.hasOwnProperty(key)){
            // objCopy.keyæ˜¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²,[]å¯ä»¥å½“æˆå˜é‡
            targetCopy[key] = target[key]
        }
    }
    return targetCopy
}

æ·±æ‹·è´å®ç°

function deepClone(target){
    if(target == null || typeof target !== 'object') return target
    if(target instanceof Date) return new Date(target)
    if(target instanceof RegExp) return new RegExp(target)
    if(target instanceof Function) return target
    let targetCopy = Array.isArray(target) ? [] : {}
    for(let key in target){
        // ä¸è¦éšå¼
        if(target.hasOwnProperty(key)){
            // objCopy.keyæ˜¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²,[]å¯ä»¥å½“æˆå˜é‡
            targetCopy[key] = typeof target[key] === 'object' ? deepClone(target[key]) : target[key]
        }
    }
    return targetCopy
}

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ä¸‹é¢çš„ç»“æœï¼š

å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾ï¼Œå› ä¸ºé€’å½’è¿›å…¥æ­»å¾ªç¯å¯¼è‡´æ ˆå†…å­˜æº¢å‡ºäº†ã€‚é’ˆå¯¹è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µçš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ˜¯å¯ä»¥é¢å¤–å¼€è¾Ÿä¸€ä¸ªå­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´ï¼Œæ¥å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡å’Œæ‹·è´å¯¹è±¡çš„å¯¹åº”å…³ç³»ï¼Œå½“éœ€è¦æ‹·è´å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡æ—¶ï¼Œå…ˆå»å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´ä¸­æ‰¾ï¼Œæœ‰æ²¡æœ‰æ‹·è´è¿‡è¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰çš„è¯ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰çš„è¯ç»§ç»­æ‹·è´ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©Mapè¿™ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼š

æ£€æŸ¥mapä¸­æœ‰æ— å…‹éš†è¿‡çš„å¯¹è±¡ æœ‰ - ç›´æ¥è¿”å› æ²¡æœ‰ - å°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºkeyï¼Œå…‹éš†å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºvalueè¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨ ç»§ç»­å…‹éš†

å…ˆäº†è§£ä¸‹å¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨å¾ªç¯å¼•ç”¨ï¼Ÿ

const isCycleObject = (obj, parent) => {
    const parentArr = parent || [obj];
    for(let i in obj) {
        if(typeof obj[i] === 'object') {
            let flag = false;
            parentArr.forEach((pObj) => {
                if(pObj === obj[i]){
                    flag = true
                }
            })
            if(flag) return true
            flag = isCycleObject(obj[i],[...parentArr,obj[i]])
            if(flag) return true
        }
    }
    return false
}

const a = 1
const b = {a}
const c = {b}
const o = {d:{a:3},c}
o.c.b.aa = a

console.log(isCycleObject(o)

// ä»¥ä¸ŠMapå¯ä»¥ç”¨WeakMapåšä¼˜åŒ–ï¼ŒWeakMapä¸­çš„keyæ˜¯å¼±å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå·®åˆ«å¯è§https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000020255831?u_atoken=5f056195-4e25-4102-bf4d-34759c002cf6&u_asig=2760822017189540453518785eac30&u_aref=QQ5gGW8fS2LWQwcdne4ZDAfoDgw%3D
// function clone(target, map = new WeakMap()) {
    // ...
// };
function deepClone(target, map = new Map()) {
    if (typeof target === "object" || typeof target === "function" || target === null) return target
    let targetCopy = Array.isArray(target) ? [] : {}
    if (map.has(target)) return target
    map.set(target, targetCopy)
    for (let key in targetCopy) {
        if (target.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
            targetCopy[key] = typeof target[key] === "object" ? deepClone(target[key]) : target[key]
        }
    }
    return targetCopy
}

```js
// è¾“å…¥
function f () {const a = 1}
const target = {
    field1: 1,
    field2: undefined,
    field3: {
        child: 'child'
    },
    field4: [2, 4, 8],
    field5: f,
    f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: { f: {} } } } } } } } } } } },
};

const targetCopy = deepClone(target)
